pages.text: The $(mob)Unicorn$() is a flying monster that spawns in the $(thing)Underworld$(). It attacks players on sight, charging them with its horn and then attacking in melee with very strong knockback.
$(mob)Unicorns$() drop $(item)Leather$() on death, which can be used to make armor and various other items, such as $(item)Books$().

$(mob)Unicorns$() rarely drop a $(item)Unicorn Horn$() on death, which is primarily used to upgrade a $(item)Crude Halo$() into a true $(item)Halo$(). It may also be used to create a $(item)Unicorn Horn Dagger$().
